Laura is a data scientist with a career focused on data management, reporting, and analytics. She specializes in long-term datasets, ranging from ecology to human health surveillance. Laura has strong technical expertise in R, Python, and SQL, and a wide range of skills in data science, including database management, creating reproducible workflows, and applying machine learning techniques. She is highly organized, efficiency-driven, and has a love of nature.
